EmailTemplate.description: Template for informing CSR for Rejected RMA
EmailTemplate.name: RMA: Rejected
EmailTemplate.subject: {!RMA__c.Fab__c} {!RMA__c.Name} for {!RMA__c.Customer_Name__c} is {!RMA__c.Status__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!RMA__c.Fab__c} {!RMA__c.Name} for {!RMA__c.Customer_Name__c} is {!RMA__c.Status__c}.
Please take necessary action before re-submitting.
Click here to access the RMA request.
Thank You. _______________________________________________________ Note: This is a system generated auto email notification. Please do not reply.
